questions.question: What does Phoebe say she would want if she were omnipotent for a day?
options: World peace, an end to hunger, and good things for the rainforest
The ability to fly and be invisible
To be the ruler of the world
To have unlimited wealth and power
questions.correct_answer: World peace, an end to hunger, and good things for the rainforest
questions.explanation: Phoebe lists these as her desires when asked what she would want if she were omnipotent for a day.

questions.question: Why does Joey say he would kill himself if he were omnipotent?
options: Because he wants to see what it's like to be dead
Because he wants to avoid the pain of living
Because Little Joey's death would mean he has no reason to live
Because he wants to go to heaven
questions.correct_answer: Because Little Joey's death would mean he has no reason to live
questions.explanation: Joey explains this when Ross questions his statement about killing himself if he were omnipotent.

questions.question: Why did Phoebe not get any sleep the night before?
options: Because she was working late
Because her grandmother's boyfriend is insecure and deaf
Because she was watching TV all night
Because she was reading a book
questions.correct_answer: Because her grandmother's boyfriend is insecure and deaf
questions.explanation: Phoebe explains that her grandmother's boyfriend and his partner are insecure and deaf, leading to loud reassurances during the night.

questions.question: What does Rachel receive in the mail?
options: A letter from her mother
A package from her friends
Her first paycheck
A bill from the bank
questions.correct_answer: Her first paycheck
questions.explanation: Rachel excitedly shows her friends the paycheck she received in the mail.

questions.question: What is Ross's reaction when he sees the boots in the store window?
options: He buys them immediately
He ignores them
He stares at them, reminiscent of his past with Carol
He laughs at them
questions.correct_answer: He stares at them, reminiscent of his past with Carol
questions.explanation: Ross is taken aback by the boots, remembering the night he first had sex with Carol, who was wearing similar boots.

questions.question: Why does Ross decide to go to the hockey game with the guys?
options: Because he wants to take his mind off Carol
Because he loves hockey
Because Joey promised to buy him a big thumb finger
Because Chandler promised to be on his best behavior
questions.correct_answer: Because he wants to take his mind off Carol and Joey promises to buy him a big thumb finger
questions.explanation: Ross agrees to go to the game after Joey promises to buy him a big thumb finger, hoping it will distract him from his thoughts about Carol.

questions.question: What happens to Ross at the hockey game?
options: He scores a goal
He gets into a fight with another fan
A puck hits him in the face
He meets a famous hockey player
questions.correct_answer: A puck hits him in the face
questions.explanation: A puck flies off the rink and hits Ross in the face during the game.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe bring Operation to Monica and Rachel's apartment?
options: Because she wants to play it with them
Because she wants to give it to them as a gift
Because she lost the tweezers and wants their help to find them
Because she wants to use it to treat a medical condition
questions.correct_answer: Because she wants to play it with them
questions.explanation: Phoebe brings the game to play with Monica and Rachel during their slumber party, although she mentions she lost the tweezers.

questions.question: What does Monica see when she looks at George Stephanopoulos' apartment with binoculars?
options: George Stephanopoulos alone
George Stephanopoulos with a woman
George Stephanopoulos watching TV
George Stephanopoulos eating pizza
questions.correct_answer: George Stephanopoulos with a woman
questions.explanation: Monica sees George Stephanopoulos with a woman in his apartment when she uses binoculars to look into his window.

questions.question: Why does Ross reveal that his first time with Carol was also his first time ever?
options: Because he wants to impress the guys
Because he is proud of it
Because Chandler and Joey press him for information about his past with Carol
Because he wants to make them feel sorry for him
questions.correct_answer: Because Chandler and Joey press him for information about his past with Carol
questions.explanation: Ross shares this personal detail after Chandler and Joey continually ask him about his relationship with Carol and why the anniversary of their first time is significant to him.

questions.question: What does Rachel tell the Visa card people on the phone?
options: That she hasn't been using her card much
That she is doing well and doesn't need their help
That she has magic beans
That she wants to cancel her card
questions.correct_answer: That she has magic beans
questions.explanation: Rachel mentions having 'magic beans' in a metaphorical sense, referencing her previous conversation with Phoebe about taking risks and finding new opportunities.

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's visit to the Emergency Room?
options: He broke his arm
He got into a fight
A puck hit him in the face during a hockey game
He has a headache
questions.correct_answer: A puck hit him in the face during a hockey game
questions.explanation: Ross goes to the Emergency Room after being hit in the face by a puck during the hockey game.

questions.question: What is Phoebe's reaction when she sees the woman with George Stephanopoulos?
options: She is happy for him
She is indifferent
She yells at the woman through the binoculars
She starts crying
questions.correct_answer: She yells at the woman through the binoculars
questions.explanation: Phoebe reacts jealously on Monica's behalf, yelling at the woman with George Stephanopoulos when she sees her reaching for his pizza.

questions.question: Why does Chandler try to convince Ross to stay and watch the hockey game?
options: Because he wants to spend time with Ross
Because he thinks the game will take Ross's mind off Carol
Because he wants to see the rest of the game himself
Because Joey promised to buy Ross a big thumb finger
questions.correct_answer: Because he thinks the game will take Ross's mind off Carol
questions.explanation: Chandler tries to persuade Ross to stay at the game, suggesting that it will help distract him from his thoughts about Carol and their past.

questions.question: What is the name of the game that Monica and the girls play during their slumber party?
options: Monopoly
Twister
Operation
Charades
questions.correct_answer: Twister
questions.explanation: The girls decide to play Twister during their slumber party, which leads to a fun and chaotic scene.

questions.question: What does Rachel give up when she leaves her fiancé at the altar?
options: Her job
Her apartment
Her orthodontist fiancé
Her car
questions.correct_answer: Her orthodontist fiancé
questions.explanation: Rachel mentions that she gave up her orthodontist fiancé when she left him at the altar, comparing it to Jack giving up his cow in the story of Jack and the Beanstalk.

questions.question: What is the reason for the fight between Ross and the kid in the Emergency Room?
options: Ross wants to borrow the kid's toy
The kid pulled Ross's hair
Ross wants his hockey puck back
The kid took Ross's seat
questions.correct_answer: Ross wants his hockey puck back
questions.explanation: Ross and the kid get into a fight because Ross wants the hockey puck that the kid found and refuses to give back.

questions.question: What does Monica see when she uses the binoculars to look into George Stephanopoulos' apartment?
options: George Stephanopoulos eating pizza
George Stephanopoulos watching TV
George Stephanopoulos with a woman
George Stephanopoulos reading a book
questions.correct_answer: George Stephanopoulos with a woman
questions.explanation: Monica uses binoculars to spy on George Stephanopoulos and sees him with a woman in his apartment.

questions.question: What is the significance of the date for Ross?
options: It's his birthday
It's the anniversary of his first time with Carol
It's the day he met his friends
It's the day he started his job
questions.correct_answer: It's the anniversary of his first time with Carol
questions.explanation: Ross reveals that the current date is the anniversary of his first time with Carol, which is why he's been reminiscing about their past throughout the episode.

questions.question: Why does Rachel's friend Leslie visit Central Perk?
options: To meet Rachel's new friends
To celebrate Leslie's pregnancy
To catch up with Rachel after her decision to leave her fiancé
To apply for a job at Central Perk
questions.correct_answer: To catch up with Rachel after her decision to leave her fiancé
questions.explanation: Leslie and her friends visit Central Perk to see Rachel and catch up after her recent decision to leave her fiancé at the altar.

questions.question: What does Phoebe compare Rachel's situation to?
options: Cinderella's story
The story of Jack and the Beanstalk
The story of Goldilocks
The story of Sleeping Beauty
questions.correct_answer: The story of Jack and the Beanstalk
questions.explanation: Phoebe compares Rachel's decision to leave her fiancé and start a new life to the story of Jack and the Beanstalk, where Jack gives up something valuable for a potentially greater reward.

questions.question: What does Monica offer to make for Rachel and their friends during the slumber party?
options: Tiki Death Punch
Pizza
Salad
Ice cream
questions.correct_answer: Tiki Death Punch
questions.explanation: Monica offers to make Tiki Death Punch for Rachel and their friends during the slumber party.

questions.question: Why does Chandler pretend to be Rachel when talking to the Visa card people?
options: Because Rachel asked him to
Because he wants to help Rachel
Because he thinks it will be funny
Because he wants to practice his impersonation skills
questions.correct_answer: Because Rachel asked him to
questions.explanation: Chandler pretends to be Rachel when talking to the Visa card people because Rachel asks him to take her place on the phone.

questions.question: What is the name of the pizza delivery guy who comes to Monica and Rachel's apartment?
options: Pizza Guy
Delivery Guy
Food Guy
No name mentioned
questions.correct_answer: Pizza Guy
questions.explanation: The pizza delivery guy is referred to as 'Pizza Guy' when he arrives at Monica and Rachel's apartment.

questions.question: What does Ross do when the kid refuses to give him back his hockey puck?
options: He buys the kid a new puck
He offers to trade something for the puck
He tries to take the puck back by force
He gives up and walks away
questions.correct_answer: He tries to take the puck back by force
questions.explanation: Ross tries to physically take the puck back from the kid, leading to a brief fight between them.

questions.question: What is the outcome of Ross's fight with the kid over the hockey puck?
options: Ross gets the puck back
The kid keeps the puck
The receptionist intervenes and takes the puck
The puck is damaged in the fight
questions.correct_answer: The receptionist intervenes and the kid keeps the puck, but the puck flies out of the kid's hands and hits the receptionist
questions.explanation: The fight between Ross and the kid ends with the receptionist intervening, but not before the puck flies out of the kid's hands and hits her.

questions.question: What does Monica say about George Stephanopoulos when she sees him through the binoculars?
options: That he is shy and needs to be drawn out
That he is confident and outgoing
That he is intelligent and charming
That he is boring and uninteresting
questions.correct_answer: That he is shy and needs to be drawn out
questions.explanation: Monica speculates that George Stephanopoulos is shy and needs to be drawn out, based on her observation of him through the binoculars.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe yell at the woman with George Stephanopoulos through the binoculars?
options: Because she is jealous on Monica's behalf
Because she is angry at the woman for being with George
Because she wants to get George's attention
Because she is trying to scare the woman away
questions.correct_answer: Because she is jealous on Monica's behalf
questions.explanation: Phoebe yells at the woman through the binoculars because she is feeling protective and jealous on Monica's behalf, who had been crushing on George Stephanopoulos.

questions.question: What does Rachel tell her friends about her job as a waitress?
options: That she loves it and is very good at it
That it's okay, but she's not sure if she'll stay
That she hates it and wants to quit
That she writes the specials on the specials board and takes out the dead flowers
questions.correct_answer: That she writes the specials on the specials board and takes out the dead flowers, and sometimes puts chocolate blobbies on the cookies
questions.explanation: Rachel mentions specific tasks she performs as a waitress, including writing the specials and taking out the dead flowers, as well as the occasional task of putting chocolate blobbies on cookies.
